name: Dappy
tagline: Dappy or Draw And Paint in PYthon. A GPL drawing program written in Python, PyGTK, and PyCairo. Dappy was forked from the painthon project on Google code.
body:
## Dappy is far from complete but is almost usable.

### Project goals:
* A functional paint program written in Python.
* A modular program that can be loaded into other Python applications.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
